Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Cycloviolacin O19 (cyO19, cyclotides; natural AMPs; plants; XXC; 3S=S, UCBB1ab)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 10 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 10 uM), S. aureus (MIC 10 uM), and C. albicans (MIC 20 uM) (Str√∂mstedt AA et al., 2017).  Also, plant fungi F. oxysporum (MIC 12.5-25 uM), B. cinerea (MIC 1.5 uM), F. graminearum (MIC 12.5 uM), F. culmorum (MIC 1.5 uM), C. utrechtense (MIC 6.25 uM), A. alternatam (MIC 1.5 uM) (Slazak et al. 2018).Updated 8/2019; 7/2021; 12/2023
Literature Information.Author: Ireland DC, Colgrave ML, Craik DJ.2006
Literature Information.Title: A novel suite of cyclotides from Viola odorata: sequence variation and the implications for structure, function and stability.
